LanguageData.AT_PsalterionResearch.label: Basileios Psalterion crafting
LanguageData.AT_PsalterionResearch.description:
Research the means to craft the Basileios Psalterion - an item normally only obtainable by trade. These artifacts can summon ishmutian boss threats to the vicinity.
They are costly to craft, requiring materials from the very bosses they summon. However, wealthy colonies can reinvest spoils from a defeated boss into more Psalterions. This allows one to make consistent returns on boss materials.
